lead_paragraph: ERIKSEN--Stein, December 11, 1927-December 27, 2015. Stein Eriksen Lodge mourns the passing of our namesake Stein Eriksen. It was Stein's vision that created the lodge. He set the high standard for hospitality and service that still exists today. His celebrity charisma created a special ambiance within the Lodge, restaurant and out on the mountain that was warm and inviting and contributed to Deer Valley Resort being named number one and the Lodge being named "World's Best Ski Hotel." As one of the most recognized names in the ski world, Stein Eriksen has been synonymous with skiing style and elegance for more than 60 years. Our thoughts are with his wife Francois and his son Bjorn, three daughters, Julianna, Ava and Anja, as well as his five grandchildren. Stein will be sorely missed. Ski well our friend! Dennis A Suskind, President Russ Olsen, CEO 1/3
